name: ddd
curlCommand:
curl 'http://localhost:8989/project/menu.config.json?v=1766994005713' \
  -H 'Accept: */*' \
  -H 'Accept-Language: en,zh-CN;q=0.9,zh;q=0.8,en-US;q=0.7,ar;q=0.6' \
  -H 'Cache-Control: no-cache' \
  -H 'Connection: keep-alive' \
  -b 'session-sensor=5c3cb016-d285-48e1-81c5-6a450aa64f0d' \
  -H 'Pragma: no-cache' \
  -H 'Referer: http://localhost:8989/sensor/home/linkage/transmission_config' \
  -H 'Sec-Fetch-Dest: empty' \
  -H 'Sec-Fetch-Mode: cors' \
  -H 'Sec-Fetch-Site: same-origin' \
  -H 'User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/142.0.0.0 Safari/537.36' \
  -H 'sec-ch-ua: "Chromium";v="142", "Google Chrome";v="142", "Not_A Brand";v="99"' \
  -H 'sec-ch-ua-mobile: ?0' \
  -H 'sec-ch-ua-platform: "Windows"'
